excerpt: "There is no reason to expect the arrival of a global digital mind, as many seem to fear or hope. Like so much else in contemporary thought, the idea that evolution tends towards a single godlike intelligence is a relic of monotheism. The upshot could be more like Homer’s world of warring gods."
